Item.Value: [Text:Oh hello, you must be the welcome commitee. Imust say I was hoping the town my sister had decided to settle down in would have a bit more glamor but she never was one to worry about that. Could you fix me up a place to live please? I'm afraid that I'm stuck here with you all forthe forseeable future.][UnlockBuildingID:15][Name:Introduction]
[Text:Hi $Name$. You know, seeing you running around is one of the few bright bright spots of this place. You're so driven, it's inspiring.][Default]
[Text:I'm not used to living on the outskirts like this. There's dirt everywhere. Do you have any idea how often I have to wash my robes to keep them clean? How do you handle it?][Default]
[Text:For me? Oh no, you shouldn't have!][Name:Gift]
[Text:How did you get this out here? I thought I would have needed to take a trip out of town to get this! Thank you so much!][Name:Collection]
[Text:Are you sure? I guess I can join you for an adventure today.][Name:JoinPartyYes]
[Text:Sorry... I've got things to do today. Maybe later?][Name:JoinPartyNo]
[Text:This town has it's quaint charm but... I miss the city. I can't wait until $Character_4$ and I have finished our business here.][Name:Dialogue|3]
[Text:I didn't think I'd see you today. I always jump at the opportunity to do nothing on rainy days. I guess you've got more on your plate than I do though, hm?][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]
